subject: Older voices.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:

Hi all;

Years ago I had added a tone generator to one of the board to mix a tone in 
wiht the tuner audio before it went to the echo box. the tone was annoying, 
but it may have hellped the voices. I was thinking aobu the tones, and maybe 
using only tones in kind of Spiricom like device to eleiminate the need fo 
radio, and tuners.

Frank
